answerText: Nicolas Cage [10] In this infamous 1993 Christopher Coppola film, Cage plays a stupid hustler named Eddie. This film is best known for such lines as Cage rhetorically asking "What am I-a fucking retard man?" and Cage assaulting someone after shouting "Hi-fucking-yah!"
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Minnesota A  | 12 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: An avid comics fan, this actor apparently changed his last name to honor the superhero Power Man. For 10 points each: [10] Name this actor, born with the last name Coppola, who has appeared in such films as Leaving Las Vegas, Ghost Rider, and the National Treasure films.
